segments.text: A knight on horseback engages in a sword fight with a soldier

critique: 1. Here, instead of “A knight on horseback engages in a sword fight with a soldier,” it should be described as “a soldier swings an axe and leaps toward the mounted knight, knocking him off his horse.”

captions.single: A knight on horseback engages in a sword fight with a soldier, falls off the horse, and other knights and soldiers fight in the background.
